td.content: s:white male retired aged 70 yrs presents with 5 months history of moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments, moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear and moderate pain and discharge in ear. o:Height 69 in, Weight 131 lbs, Temperature 98.5 F, Pulse 77, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 15 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

s:white male retired aged 70 years presents with 3 months history of moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments, moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear and moderate pain and discharge in ear. he denies drinking alcohol Patient does not smoke o:Height 70 in, Weight 135 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Myringotomy - ear.

td.content: s:pt complains of recurrent moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear over the past month. The pt reports moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments. patient is a 71 year old male retired. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life denies any alcohol use o:Height 70 in, Weight 137 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 17 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.

td.content: s:pt with moderate pain and discharge in ear, moderate decreased hearing in the affected ear and moderate difficulty hearing words during conversation especially in noisy environments. he has had several such episodes over past 3 years. pt is a 71 YO male. o:Height 70 in, Weight 134 lbs, Temperature 98.4 F, Pulse 72, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 68, Respiration 16 a:Hearing Loss p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and ordered pure tone audiometry.
